title: She Learns To Kneel
description: Kathryn has fallen under the alluring spell of Master Patrick, the wealthy and charismatic Dominant, following him to his palatial home. There she meets Amelie, a spunky, energetic sub with a weakness for pain, and Mistress Victoria, a strict disciplinarian with, it seems, a weakness for Kathryn. In a tale of ecstatic pleasure and agonizing pain Kathryn finally begins her training as Master's perfect submissive. But will she survive her induction?She Learns To Kneel is the second book in the Kathryn's Training series, the sequel to Her First Submission. She Learns To Kneel includes BDSM, F/f domination, M/f domination, spanking, lashing, oral sex, light bondage and elements of reluctant consent as part of a Dominant/submissive relationship.
author: Aya Fukunishi
